languages.text: "Пожалуй, ты прав{mf||а}. Я лишь слуга, а будущим протектората распоряжаться тебе. Ты главн{mf|ый|ая}, и я подчиняюсь, я... Дарий фон Валанциус, старший брат Теодоры, которого она превратила в гибрид машины и человека".

"You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."
languages.original_text: "Пожалуй, ты прав{mf||а}. Я лишь слуга, а будущим протектората распоряжаться тебе. Ты главн{mf|ый|ая}, и я подчиняюсь, я... Дарий фон Валанциус, старший брат Теодоры, которого она превратила в гибрид машины и человека".

traits.locale_text: "You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

"You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

languages.text: «Puede que tengas razón. No soy más que un sirviente, y el futuro del protectorado está en tus manos. Tú eres la autoridad, y yo obedezco. Soy... Darius von Valancius, el hermano mayor de Theodora a quien convirtió en una amalgama de hombre y máquina».
languages.original_text: "You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

traits.locale_text: «Puede que tengas razón. No soy más que un sirviente, y el futuro del protectorado está en tus manos. Tú eres la autoridad, y yo obedezco. Soy... Darius von Valancius, el hermano mayor de Theodora a quien convirtió en una amalgama de hombre y máquina».

languages.text: “你的话很有道理。整个王朝的未来都掌握在你的手中，而我仅仅是个奴仆而已。你是王朝的领袖，我必须服从。我是……达利乌斯·冯·瓦兰修斯，西奥多拉的哥哥，是她把我变成了机器与肉体的融合体。”
languages.original_text: "You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

traits.locale_text: “你的话很有道理。整个王朝的未来都掌握在你的手中，而我仅仅是个奴仆而已。你是王朝的领袖，我必须服从。我是……达利乌斯·冯·瓦兰修斯，西奥多拉的哥哥，是她把我变成了机器与肉体的融合体。”

languages.text: 「分かっているな。私はただの召使いにすぎないし、保護領の未来はあなたの手の中にある。あなたが主であり、私は従う。私はダリウス・フォン・ヴァランシウス、シオドーラの兄であり、彼女が私を機械と人間の融合体に変えた」
languages.original_text: "You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

traits.locale_text: 「分かっているな。私はただの召使いにすぎないし、保護領の未来はあなたの手の中にある。あなたが主であり、私は従う。私はダリウス・フォン・ヴァランシウス、シオドーラの兄であり、彼女が私を機械と人間の融合体に変えた」

languages.text: "Ein guter Punkt. Ich bin nur ein Diener. Die Zukunft des Protektorats liegt in Euren Händen. Ihr seid die Autorität und ich gehorche. Ich bin ... Darius von Valancius, Theodoras älterer Bruder, den sie in ein Gemisch aus Mensch und Maschine verwandelt hat."
languages.original_text: "You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

traits.locale_text: "Ein guter Punkt. Ich bin nur ein Diener. Die Zukunft des Protektorats liegt in Euren Händen. Ihr seid die Autorität und ich gehorche. Ich bin ... Darius von Valancius, Theodoras älterer Bruder, den sie in ein Gemisch aus Mensch und Maschine verwandelt hat."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Je ne suis qu'un humble serviteur, et l'avenir du protectorat est entre vos mains. Vous incarnez l'autorité, et je vous dois obéissance. Je suis... Darius von Valancius, le frère aîné de Théodora, qu'elle a transformé en une créature hybride moitié homme moitié machine. »
languages.original_text: "You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Je ne suis qu'un humble serviteur, et l'avenir du protectorat est entre vos mains. Vous incarnez l'autorité, et je vous dois obéissance. Je suis... Darius von Valancius, le frère aîné de Théodora, qu'elle a transformé en une créature hybride moitié homme moitié machine. »

languages.text: "Haklı olabilirsin. Ben yalnızca bir hizmetkârım. Protektoranın geleceğini sen şekillendireceksin. Sen otoritesin, bense itaat eden. Ben... Darius von Valancius'um. Theodora'nın makine ve insan karışımı bir yaratığa dönüştürdüğü ağabeyiyim."
languages.original_text: "You may have a point. I am but a servant, and the future of the protectorate is in your hands. You are the authority, and I obey. I am... Darius von Valancius, Theodora's older brother, whom she turned into an amalgam of machine and man."

traits.locale_text: "Haklı olabilirsin. Ben yalnızca bir hizmetkârım. Protektoranın geleceğini sen şekillendireceksin. Sen otoritesin, bense itaat eden. Ben... Darius von Valancius'um. Theodora'nın makine ve insan karışımı bir yaratığa dönüştürdüğü ağabeyiyim."
